title: User Guide
subtitle: How to use InterTrader
body: InterTrader is designed to help you take advantage of the price variations between exchanges. This is a quick start guide with purely the essentials for you to use the app. ## Getting started ### Get the app If you haven't already, download and install the app from [Google Play](https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=club.lambomoon.cec). ### Find some coins When InterTrader starts you'll be on the _Favourites_ page. This list will be empty, so start by tapping the _`Find some coins`_ button . ![Start page](/gin-data/images/1527767084077-start-page.png) ### Browse exchanges Tap the exchange you'd like to browse. If looking for a specific coin, tap the search icon in the top right corner and start typing out the _symbol_. ![Exchanges](/gin-data/images/1527767569202-exchange-list.png) {{list type=page}}
